text: ‘‘allahanu kaluhisiruva sandesavannu anusarisiri’’ endu avarodane helidaga avaru ‘‘navu nam'ma tata muttatandirannu yava dariyalli kandiddevo a dariyannu matra anusarisuvevu’’ ennuttare. Avara tata muttatandiru svalpavu bud'dhi illadavaragiddaru mattu darigettavaragiddaru (avaru avaranne anusarisuvare)
